About
Black Creek Lodge is a premier RV park and marina located in the beautiful Gulf of Florida. With stunning views and easy access to the ocean, our location offers the perfect setting for relaxation and adventure. Our full-service RV park includes amenities such as water, sewer, power, cable TV, internet access, laundry facilities and more.
Welcome to Black Creek Lodge RV Park and Marina
Nestled among lush green trees, site Black Creek Lodge RV Park and Marina, a fisher's haven. Enjoy the spacious RV sites and the optimal location for fishing and exploring the area. Whether you prefer to be out on the water or skimming through racks of clothing while shopping, you can find it around Freeport, Florida. Book your spot today or your next Floridian getaway!
THE RV PARK AMENITIES
Restrooms
boat launch
Cable TV
fishing
Trash
waterfront
In the heart of the Gulf of Florida, Black Creek Lodge offers a premier RV park and marina experience. Our stunning views and close proximity to the ocean provide an unbeatable setting for relaxation and exploration alike. From full-service RV hookups to spacious tent sites to our marina's 40 foot vessel slips, there is something here for everyone in your group! We offer amenities such as water, sewer, power, cable TV and internet access - plus laundry services and fuel docks for fuelling up your boat. And with plenty of dockside parking for boats and RVs, it's never been easier to enjoy all that we have to offer. Plus we are located near local restaurants and attractions so you can get out and explore even more!
stay at the rv park enjoy the marina
Black Creek RV Park is the perfect place to set up basecamp while you explore all that the Emerald Coast has to offer. Our RV park in Freeport is small and secluded, so you can enjoy peace and quiet after a long day of sightseeing. And speaking of sights, there are plenty to see in the area! Destin is just a short drive away, and you'll find many other great locations nearby as well. Best of all, our RV campground is open all year long, so you can come and enjoy the Emerald Coast anytime you like. So if you're looking for a comfortable place to stay on your next vacation, look no further than Black Creek Lodge RV Park. We'll make sure you have everything you need for a memorable trip.
Close to the coast
If you're looking for a fun-filled vacation destination, look no further than Freeport, Florida. This small town is located on the Gulf of Mexico and is known for its beautiful beaches and abundance of activities. Whether you enjoy spending your days lounging on the sand or exploring the local shops and restaurants, Freeport has something for everyone to enjoy. There are also numerous nature parks and preserves in the area, making it the perfect place to get away from it all and enjoy some time outdoors. With so much to see and do, Freeport is sure to provide you with an unforgettable vacation experience.
Things to do in Freeport
If you're looking for things to do in Freeport, Florida, you won't be disappointed. This small town is bursting with activities, from exploring the outdoors to indulging in some retail therapy. For nature lovers, there are plenty of opportunities to get outside and enjoy the sunshine. Take a stroll along the boardwalk, go for a swim in the Gulf of Mexico, or explore one of the many nature trails. If you're more of a shopper, Freeport's Main Street is lined with boutique shops and art galleries. And when it comes time to refuel, you'll find plenty of restaurants serving up fresh seafood and local produce. Whether you're looking for relaxation or adventure, Freeport has something for everyone.
Freeport, Florida is a popular tourist destination for its beautiful beaches and its many attractions. Black Creek Lodge RV Park is the perfect place to stay when visiting Freeport. The RV Park is located in a peaceful and quiet area, away from the hustle and bustle of the city. yet it is still close enough to all the attractions that Freeport has to offer. The RV Park has full hookups for RVs, as well as cable TV and Wi-Fi. There is also a laundry facility on site. The staff at Black Creek Lodge RV Park are friendly and helpful, and they will make sure that your stay is enjoyable. When you're ready to explore Freeport, Florida, be sure to start your trip at Black Creek Lodge RV Park.
